| History                 = Snow Globe Holiday Decoration Supply was a business located in [[Paramus]], [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]]. During [[Knull (Earth-616)|Knull]]'s invasion of [[Earth]], its owner, [[Michael Dunwoody (Earth-616)|Mike Dunwoody]], became corrupted by a symbiote of Knull and fought [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] and [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Doctor Doom]] while in-character, dressed as [[Santa Claus]].{{r|King in Black: Iron Man/Doom Vol 1 1}}
